title: help with my FPS
body:
i recently had a virus on my computer and had to do a clean wipe , and reinstall everything including windows 10 .. now ive reinstall league . my fps  are stuck at 60 fps .. where before it was between 140 -250fps  

If i go into window mode , rather than full screen my fps will go back to normal ( at 200 ish ) but as soon as i go into full screen it is stuck at 60fps

replies.body:
Hmm.. it sounds like this could be caused by the Windows 10 anniversary update that enabled the Game DVR feature for games in fullscreen mode. I recommend [disabling the Xbox Game Bar entirely](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) to see if this resolves the issue for you.

Let me know if this helped.
Thank you very much! Targon Blade  , that was the issue. I Been looking for a solution all day haha. would of never of thought of that  :):):)
Uncheck wait for vertical sync option under the graphical settings.
